content: To start, Yellowbrow will often charge up his spiked mace before thrusting it right at you, increasing its length and size with surprising reach.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
To start, Yellowbrow will often charge up his spiked mace before thrusting it right at you, increasing its length and size with surprising reach.
